id.title: List ID
id.description: A string that uniquely identifies this list.

contact_count.title: List Contact
contact_count.description: [Contact information displayed in campaign footers](https://mailchimp.com/help/about-campaign-footers/) to comply with international spam laws.

_metadata.title: Statistics
_metadata.description: Stats for the list. Many of these are cached for at least five minutes.

self.title: Campaign Last Sent
self.description: The date and time the last campaign was sent to this list in ISO 8601 format. This is updated when a campaign is sent to 10 or more recipients.

json_schema.title: Campaign
json_schema.description: A summary of an individual campaign's settings and content.

id.title: Campaign ID
id.description: A string that uniquely identifies this campaign.

name.title: Archive URL
name.description: The link to the campaign's archive version in ISO 8601 format.

create_at.title: Create Time
create_at.description: The date and time the campaign was created in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.title: Send Time
updated_at.description: The date and time a campaign was sent.

is_abtest.title: Needs Block Refresh
is_abtest.description: Determines if the campaign needs its blocks refreshed by opening the web-based campaign editor. Deprecated and will always return false.
